code:
%% DFA lexera IFJ – mermaid diagram (zjednodušená verzia)
%% Vysoká úroveň stavového automatu lexera bez všetkých vnútorných pod-stavov.

stateDiagram-v2
    direction LR
    [*] --> START

%%------------------------------------
%% Hlavný rozbočovač (lexer_next)
%%------------------------------------
    state "lexer_next: START" as START

    START --> EOF       : EOF
    START --> EOL       : EOL

    START --> SEP_LP    : "("
    START --> SEP_RP    : ")"
    START --> SEP_LB    : "{"
    START --> SEP_RB    : "}"
    START --> SEP_COMMA : ","

    START --> OP_MUL    : "*"
    START --> OP_PLUS   : "+"
    START --> OP_MINUS  : "-"
    START --> OP_Q      : "?"
    START --> OP_COLON  : dvojbodka

    START --> OP_COMPLEX      : "=, <, >, !, &, |, ."
    START --> SLASH_OR_COMMENT : "/"

    START --> GLOBAL_VAR  : "_ (global)"
    START --> WORD        : "pismeno"
    START --> NUMBER      : "cislica"
    START --> STRING      : "\""

%%------------------------------------
%% Finálne jednoduché tokeny
%%------------------------------------
state EOF
    EOF --> [*]

state EOL
EOL --> [*]

state SEP_LP
SEP_LP --> [*]

state SEP_RP
SEP_RP --> [*]

state SEP_LB
SEP_LB --> [*]

state SEP_RB
SEP_RB --> [*]

state SEP_COMMA
SEP_COMMA --> [*]

state OP_MUL
OP_MUL --> [*]

state OP_PLUS
OP_PLUS --> [*]

state OP_MINUS
OP_MINUS --> [*]

state OP_Q
OP_Q --> [*]

state OP_COLON
OP_COLON --> [*]

%%------------------------------------
%% Slová, kľúčové slová, identifikátory
%%------------------------------------
state WORD {
[*] --> WORD_BODY
WORD_BODY --> WORD_BODY : "pismeno, cislica, _"
WORD_BODY --> IDENT     : "ine"
WORD_BODY --> KEYWORD   : "klucove slovo"
WORD_BODY --> BOOL_LIT  : "true, false"
WORD_BODY --> NULL_LIT  : "null"

state IDENT
IDENT --> [*]

state KEYWORD
KEYWORD --> [*]

state BOOL_LIT
BOOL_LIT --> [*]

state NULL_LIT
NULL_LIT --> [*]
}

%%------------------------------------
%% Globálne premenné (__name)
%%------------------------------------
state GLOBAL_VAR {
[*] --> GV_BODY
GV_BODY --> GV_BODY  : "pismeno, cislica, _"
GV_BODY --> GV_OK    : "zacina __"

state GV_OK
GV_OK --> [*]
}

%%------------------------------------
%% Čísla
%%------------------------------------
state NUMBER {
[*] --> NUM_INT
NUM_INT --> NUM_INT       : "cislica"
NUM_INT --> NUM_FLOAT     : "., cislica"
NUM_INT --> NUM_EXP       : "e, E"
NUM_INT --> NUM_FINAL_INT : "ine"

NUM_FLOAT --> NUM_FLOAT       : "cislica"
NUM_FLOAT --> NUM_EXP         : "e, E"
NUM_FLOAT --> NUM_FINAL_FLOAT : "ine"

NUM_EXP --> NUM_EXP_DIGITS : "+, -, cislica"
NUM_EXP_DIGITS --> NUM_EXP_DIGITS : "cislica"
NUM_EXP_DIGITS --> NUM_FINAL_FLOAT : "ine"

state NUM_FINAL_INT
NUM_FINAL_INT --> [*]

state NUM_FINAL_FLOAT
NUM_FINAL_FLOAT --> [*]
}

%%------------------------------------
%% Operátory
%%------------------------------------
state OP_COMPLEX {
[*] --> OP_DISPATCH

OP_DISPATCH --> OP_EQ     : "=="
OP_DISPATCH --> OP_ASSIGN : "="
OP_DISPATCH --> OP_LE     : "<="
OP_DISPATCH --> OP_LT     : "<"
OP_DISPATCH --> OP_GE     : ">="
OP_DISPATCH --> OP_GT     : ">"
OP_DISPATCH --> OP_AND    : "&&"
OP_DISPATCH --> OP_OR     : "||"
OP_DISPATCH --> OP_DOT    : "."
OP_DISPATCH --> OP_RANGE_INCL : ".."
OP_DISPATCH --> OP_RANGE_EXCL : "..."
OP_DISPATCH --> OP_NEQ    : "!="
OP_DISPATCH --> OP_NOT    : "!"

state OP_EQ
OP_EQ --> [*]

state OP_ASSIGN
OP_ASSIGN --> [*]

state OP_LE
OP_LE --> [*]

state OP_LT
OP_LT --> [*]

state OP_GE
OP_GE --> [*]

state OP_GT
OP_GT --> [*]

state OP_AND
OP_AND --> [*]

state OP_OR
OP_OR --> [*]

state OP_DOT
OP_DOT --> [*]

state OP_RANGE_INCL
OP_RANGE_INCL --> [*]

state OP_RANGE_EXCL
OP_RANGE_EXCL --> [*]

state OP_NEQ
OP_NEQ --> [*]

state OP_NOT
OP_NOT --> [*]
}

%%------------------------------------
%% Komentáre a /
%%------------------------------------
state SLASH_OR_COMMENT {
[*] --> SLASH_DISPATCH

SLASH_DISPATCH --> LINE_COMMENT  : "//"
SLASH_DISPATCH --> BLOCK_COMMENT : "/*"
SLASH_DISPATCH --> OP_DIV        : "/ (delenie)"

state OP_DIV
OP_DIV --> [*]

state LINE_COMMENT
LINE_COMMENT --> LINE_COMMENT : "iny znak"
LINE_COMMENT --> LC_EOL       : "EOL"
LINE_COMMENT --> LC_EOF       : "EOF"

state LC_EOL
LC_EOL --> [*]

state LC_EOF
LC_EOF --> [*]

state BLOCK_COMMENT
BLOCK_COMMENT --> BLOCK_COMMENT : "vsetko, vratane vnorenych /* ... */"
%% ukoncenie pri depth == 0 nie je specifikovane podrobne (zjednodusene)
}

%%------------------------------------
%% String literály
%%------------------------------------
state STRING {
[*] --> STR_DISPATCH

STR_DISPATCH --> STR_MULTI  : """"""
STR_DISPATCH --> STR_SINGLE : "\""

state STR_MULTI
STR_MULTI --> STR_MULTI : "lubovolny znak"
STR_MULTI --> STR_FINAL : "trojite uvodzovky (koniec)"

state STR_SINGLE
STR_SINGLE --> STR_SINGLE : "bezny znak"
STR_SINGLE --> STR_ESC    : "\\"
STR_SINGLE --> STR_FINAL  : "\""

state STR_ESC
STR_ESC --> STR_SINGLE : "jednoduchy escape alebo \\xNN"

state STR_FINAL
STR_FINAL --> [*]
}
repo_description: IFJ school project for vut fit
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
